body_html: I think that we want to be able to still see all teams as organizers, even if that is a 'super' role, that only a select few have, to protect their privacy. I would love to see all the teams, even if they want to be hidden to the wider userbase of the app.

body: I think that we want to be able to still see all teams as organizers, even if that is a 'super' role, that only a select few have, to protect their privacy. I would love to see all the teams, even if they want to be hidden to the wider userbase of the app.
